article_metadata.author: Patrick Ishmael

og.description: It's good that Dr. Ezekiel Emanuel realizes that increasing prices need to be addressed if we are to improve healthcare access in this country, but contrary to his conclusions, the answer to Obamacare's cost problems is not injecting more government into the system.
og.title: Obamacare Advisor Concedes: Cost 'Intimately Linked' With Coverage
